short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Hides correct options and explanations on Moodle quizzes

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Enhance your learning experience by focusing on the questions. This handy tool conceals all quiz answers and additional feedback on the ISIS Moodle platform, providing you a distraction-free environment to improve your problem-solving abilities. Whether preparing for an upcoming exam or reviewing course content, leverage QuizHider to customize your study sessions.
